backend/main.mo: Implements newsletter subscription storage with add, remove, lookup, and retrieval of all subscribers using maps and sets.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence entries mapping features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short predefined summaries for key frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles and a custom OKLCH color theme with light and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the LinkInBioPage component as the root application view.
frontend/src/components/BookingButton.ts: Booking button component rendering a styled link with a calendar icon.
frontend/src/components/NewsletterSignup: Newsletter signup form with validation, backend submission, and inline success/error UI states.
Renders a vertical list of social link buttons with icons opening in new tabs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks to manage Internet Identity login, stored identities, and related state.
frontend/src/hooks/useNewsletterSignup.t: Custom hook handling newsletter submission, status tracking, and error mapping from backend responses.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query wrappers for checking subscription status and retrieving all subscribers via the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables plus custom utility animations.
frontend/src/lib/newsletterValidation.ts: Provides a simple email validation function returning validity and error messages.
frontend/src/linkBioConfig.ts: Exports a configurable link‑in‑bio profile, social links, booking info, and footer text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/LinkInBioPage.tsx: Renders the link‑in‑bio page including profile header, social links, booking button, newsletter signup, and footer.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, radii, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, existing features, pending requests, and required assets.
